title: 55. 7 Signs You May Have A Mother Wound
description:
Hey girl!
 
In this episode, we talk about the 7 Signs You May Have A Mother Wound. A "mother wound", in this episode, refers to the emotional damage that you may experience as an adult as a result of having had a relationship with an emotionally abusive, narcissistic, and/or emotionally unavailable parent. We talk about the signs and as always, we talk about how important it is to validate, love, & affirm yourself & your truth, despite it all.
 
Click here to get your FREE ticket to the Choose Yourself Summit (it's virtual!) May 18-22 (or visit https://www.ashleybeaudin.com/summit?via=beatrice)

Please don't forget to rate & review!
Click here to join the no more codependent thought patterns masterclass!
(or visit beatricekamau.com/programs)
 
Business Inquiries?
Email the team: hi@beatricekamau.com
IG: @theselflovefix.
Website: www.beatricekamau.com
